类 GalleryListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller.GalleryListController

  • public class GalleryListController
extends java.lang.Object
    list of user's gallery

        dvdIndex - a index variable and is dvd's index
        photoStr - a string variable

        photoStr - a string variable
